name: Philip Allen
what_you_do: Atlantic Speakers Bureau provides a platform for connecting clients with professional public speakers, entertainers, and facilitators, emphasizing quality content and exceptional customer service.
who_you_serve: They serve clients in Canada, the United States, England, and several other countries, focusing on organizations and individuals seeking speakers and entertainers for events.
bio: Established in 1985 with 38 years of experience in the industry, recognized for quality service and a commitment to confidentiality.
business_focus: Atlantic Speakers Bureau provides a platform for connecting clients with professional public speakers, entertainers, and facilitators, emphasizing quality content and exceptional customer service.
